parsed.explanation: Fixed 1 XML tag error: Changed the mismatched closing tag </PRICE> to </PRIZE> in the fourth BIBL entry (Bonds Satyrische Gedichte). The opening tag was <PRIZE> but the closing tag was incorrectly written as </PRICE>. This was the only structural XML error in the document.
